title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Payment
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Payment 

Services) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 4th day of March
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (payment services) (amendment) regulation 2024 (2) regulation shall come operation 4th day march

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. Regulation 86 of the European Union (Payment Services) Regulations
text_raw:
2. Regulation 86 of the European Union (Payment Services) Regulations 
2018 (S.I. No. 6 of 2018) is amended, in paragraph (6), by the substitution of 
the following subparagraph for subparagraph (b): 

“(b) those payment services to which Regulation (EU) No. 260/2012 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 14 March 
20122 applies.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 April, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L 337, 23.12.2015, p. 35 
2 OJ No. L 94, 30.3.2012, p. 22 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [174] 3
